_sText:
Morning Call
------------------

**Today is February 10th. When I woke up in the morning, I felt the bright sun shines into my room. I turned on my computer and used it for a while. It was a nice morning, until my friend called me. "Hello? Are you still sleeping?" he said. Damn! I forgot the trip with my friends. I put on a coat, grabbed my bag and wallet then rushed out immediately. After I got to the train station, I noticed I forgot my phone. Oh no...**

---------------------------
### Features

You can climb nails, cables, ropes, some cloth or something looks like "climbable", also you can check if there is an "up" or "down" sign near it.

The bomb site is the area in front of the monitor on the desk.

The Electric Mosquito Zapper can be turn on by shooting the switch, watch out.

---------------------------
### Specials

Don't try to jump on the bed from high places, it hurts.

The screen on the monitor changes every rounds.

Sometimes the phone will ring.

---------------------------

Thanks to my friends for testing

Special thanks to my friend LAJ for calling me(for making the texture)

All custom textures, materials and this map were made by CXX AL

[Link to a short video of beta version](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QaY-E_DV-Mw "A link to a short testing video of beta version map")(almost same as final version)
